channel.title: CVE Feed for F5 Networks, Inc. -- BIG-IP LTM, AAM, AFM, APM, ASM, Link Controller, PEM, Websafe
channel.description: The latest CVEs for F5 Networks, Inc. -- BIG-IP LTM, AAM, AFM, APM, ASM, Link Controller, PEM, Websafe

item.title: CVE-2017-6157|2024-09-17T03:22:54.063Z -- f5%20networks%2C%20inc. -- big-ip%20ltm%2C%20aam%2C%20afm%2C%20apm%2C%20asm%2C%20link%20controller%2C%20pem%2C%20websafe
item.description: In F5 BIG-IP LTM, AAM, AFM, Analytics, APM, ASM, DNS, GTM, Link Controller, PEM and Websafe software version 12.0.0 to 12.1.1, 11.6.0 to 11.6.1, 11.5.0 - 11.5.4, virtual servers with a configuration using the HTTP Explicit Proxy functionality and/or SOCKS profile are vulnerable to an unauthenticated, remote attack that allows modification of BIG-IP system configuration, extraction of sensitive system files, and/or possible remote command execution on the BIG-IP system.
